{
	"locale": "it",
	"template":"a4-poster",
	"header":"default",
	"title": "Le Confidentiel Costi\u00e8res de N\u00eemes AOP",
	"description": "2017, Costi\u00e8res de N\u00eemes, Frankreich, 6 x 75 cl",
	"valid_to": "2019-01-07",
	"valid_from": "2018-12-31",
	"sales_price": "47.70",
	"instead_price": "98.00",
	"compared":true,
	"base_price_text": "10 cl = 1.06",
	"unit_type": "bottle",
    "unit_sales_price" : 5.90,
    "unit_instead_price": 11.00
}

item.name: appraisals

body.raw:
{
    "wine_year": 2013,
    "title": "Ein Primitivo passt immer.",
    "description": "preis leistung genuss-was will der kenner mehr...sensationell im dennerangebot.",
    "response": "Eine Antwort von Denner",
    "firstname": "Michel",
    "lastname": "Muster",
    "address": "Bahnhofstrasse 7",
    "zip_code": "8034",
    "city": "Zurich",
    "email": "email@gmx.ch",
    "gender": "female",
    "shop_user_id": 123456789,
    "language": "de",
    "marked": true,
    "processed": false,
    "approved": false,
    "approved_selfie": false,
    "image_url": "https://denner-assets.s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/assets/bef741d6-e734-41b0-ac06-3d3fe3f4fc0e/090072.png"
}

item.name: stores

request.description:
Use this operation to get a list of all stores (Filialen).

Notes:
 * On API-Gatway the queystring is integrated with: 
   * only_opened=yes
   * only_online_publishable=yes

Use this operation to get a list of all screen stores (Filialen für Werbescreens).

Notes: 
 * This is an API-Gatway only resource 
 * Is sent to the integration resource "GET /stores"
 * On API-Gatway the queystring does not integrates "filter" and "sort" params
 * On API-Gatway the respone is processed: only a few subset of store properties are propagated.

Get a single store (Filiale).

Notes:
 * Store code can be used as ID
 * On API-Gatway this resource is not available
Use this operation to get a list of all store channels (Filialkanäle; e.g. "Denner" or "Denner Satellit").
Use this operation to get a list of all store services (Filialangebote; e.g. "Humidor" or "Backstation").
Use this operation to get a list of all store flyers.

Delete single store (Filiale).

Notes:
 * On API-Gatway this resource is not available
